channel.title: Flask on Luyao Peng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Flask on Luyao Peng's Blog

item.title: Project: Web Application for Interactive Visualization of Stock Price
item.description: In this project, I developed a simple web application for interactive visualization of stock price using Bokeh and Flask modules in Python. Users can select any company to compare the trends of Close Price, Adjusted Close Price, Open Price and Adjusted Open Price for that selected company. Link to the Stock Prince app

item.title: Project: NLP in Automated Essay Scoring
item.description: In The Data Incubator, my capstone project was NLP in automated essay scoring, which was completed in Nov,2018, at that time, I havenâ€™t learned the techniques of NLP with deep learning, so this project only involves basic NLP methods such as BOW, n-gram and tree-based boosting model. Link to the MMeM github (The heroku platform only allows 30s response time for any request, sometimes the app takes takes more than 30s to respond due to an external API, please try multiple times to get the results.
